results.title: The effects of simvastatin on ischemia-reperfusion injury of sciatic nerve in adult rats.

results.title: Chitosan conduits filled with simvastatin/Pluronic F-127 hydrogel promote peripheral nerve regeneration in rats.
results.journal: J Biomed Mater Res B Appl Biomater
results.text_hl: Here, we bridged 10-mm @<m>DISEASE_Sciatic_Neuropathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020426 @@@sciatic nerve defects@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with a @CHEMICAL_Chitosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D048271 @@@chitosan@@@ conduit filled with 0, 0.5, or 1.0 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Poloxamer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020442 @@@Pluronic F-127@@@ hydrogel.
